name: Fiery Rivaz
description:
Fiery Rivaz is a vertical and horizontal auto scrolling 3d shoot'em up with an emphasis on innovative level design and an enthralling soundtrack.

Fiery Rivaz is a woman determined to save the world.
She sets off with her spaceship to find the big eye, which controls the earthly world through illusions.
In your spaceship you have 3 different weapons at your disposal, which you have to use in a targeted manner in order to pass the tests.

The game Fiery Rivez has set itself the goal of resurrecting and modernizing the shmup genre.
More innovations, variety and ideas are presented in a likeable 3D guise.
The gameplay is action-packed, fast and intense.


- 7 Levels (some vertical, some horizontal)
- 7 Cool soundtracks
- 3 Different weapons (spread, focus and x-ray)
- 3D Graphics
- Fullscreen
